tool_description: Compares return rates and metrics against industry benchmarks and historical performance standards.

current_return_rate.description: Current return rate as percentage to benchmark

industry_category.description: Industry category for benchmarking: apparel, electronics, home_goods, books, beauty

error_messages: Invalid return rate: Value must be between 0 and 100 percent
Invalid industry category: Use one of [apparel, electronics, home_goods, books, beauty]
Benchmark data unavailable: Industry benchmark data not available for the specified category
usage: Provide current_return_rate and industry_category to compare against industry standards. The tool returns benchmark comparisons and performance assessment.

industry_benchmark.description: Industry average return rate for comparison

performance_rating.description: Performance rating: excellent, good, average, below_average, poor
